name: Duck.exe
description:
Duck.exe ~Gameplay Manual~

You play as the rubber duck. Press left or right directional keys to move left and right.

Press up while in the air to flap your wings, which makes you fall slower. Press down while in the air to fall faster.

Press down while on water to dive, and let go of down to propel yourself upwards. The deeper the water, the higher you are propelled.

Eat flies to stay alive, but watch out for those lazers!
